means: （指送礼者）慷慨的，（指礼品）丰厚的

sentence.Network_en: I am so happy to get munificent birthday presents from my friends.
sentence.Network_cn: 我很高兴跟我朋友收到大量的生日礼物.

sentence.Network_en: Has the munificent technical force and the abundant economic basis.
sentence.Network_cn: 有优厚的技术力量和雄厚的经济基础.

sentence.Network_en: Certainly those who spread the message of Godhead are most munificent.
sentence.Network_cn: 的确,那些传播首神讯息的人们是最慷慨的.

municipally 市政上munificent 宽宏的-
...orate status and usually powers of self-governmentmunificent adj. 慷慨的，大方的characterized by great liberality or generosity

list.abs: A munificent gift ., 一份丰厚的礼物.
2013年3月6日 -  B. munificent 宽宏慷慨的  C. irresolute 犹豫不决的  D. laconic 言简意赅的  E. fastidious 挑剔苛求的  F. taciturn 沉默寡言的  Answer.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin munificent- (stem of munificentior, comparative of munificus 'bountiful'), from munus 'gift'

entry.def: A munificent person is very generous.

example.ex: ...one of the country's most munificent artistic benefactors.
example.tran: 这个国家最慷慨的艺术资助人之一

sentences.sentence: "the critics were lavish in their praise"
"his father gave him a half-dollar and his mother a quarter and he thought them munificent"

auth_sentence.content: MGM were consistently munificent and we left...in effortless luxury.
auth_sentence.res_content: MGM were consistently munificent and we left...in effortless luxury.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: MGM were consistently munificent and we left...in effortless luxury.

auth_sentence.content: She was awed by the munificent beauty of the gift.
auth_sentence.res_content: She was awed by the munificent beauty of the gift.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She was awed by the munificent beauty of the gift.

auth_sentence.content: The Lib Dems must surely see this as a tax break that benefits those without a munificent bank of Mum and Dad.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Lib Dems must surely see this as a tax break that benefits those without a munificent bank of Mum and Dad.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Lib Dems must surely see this as a tax break that benefits those without a munificent bank of Mum and Dad.

stems_affixes.type_exp: = 表示"服务,职责,社区,公共"

stems_affixes.word_buile: muni公共,大家+fic做+ent……的→做出来给大家→慷慨的
muni社区+cip抓+al……的→抓社区管理的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 同一地区的全体居民,社会,社区;共同体

stems_affixes.word_buile: municipal[adj.市政的,市立的]+ity表名词→n.自治城市,自治地区

stems_affixes.value_cn: 交流;通讯,通话;传达,传送
使为社会公有, 使共有化
